ext_description.p: A Additive_manufacturing_view_definition is a type of that defines a characterization view of a part to be manufactured by an additive manufacturing process. It may be an assembly of the part with its associated support geometry. The properties for the additive process may also be assigned to it.

figure.title: Example of 2 parts where the definition depends of the build direction

ext_descriptions.ext_description: an attribute inherited from the specifies the in which the defined_version has been characterized by the Additive_manufacturing_view_definition.
specifies the to be manufactured by the additive manufacturing process.
specifies the of the support geometry. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies the as it was designed. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
A Additive_manufacturing_support_structure is a type of that defines a characterization view of support geometry for an additive manufacturing process.
an attribute inherited from the specifies the in which the defined_version has been characterized by the .
A Additive_manufacturing_view_context is a type of that is used as initial context for a .
an attribute inherited from the that specifies the application domain to 'Additive manufacturing'.
A Additive_manufacturing_property_assignment is a type of that allows the assignment of properties for an additive manufacturing process.
an attribute inherited from the that specifies the .
A Additive_manufacturing_orientation_property is a type of that defines the orientations and placement for an additive manufacturing process in accordance with ISO/ASTM 52921.
an attribute inherited from the that shall be redeclared as the for the Additive_manufacturing_orientation_property.
an attribute inherited from the that specifies the representation of the build orientation associated with the property.

ext_description.p: A Build_direction_representation is a type of that defines the build direction for processes employing planar layer addition of material.

figure.title: an illustration of the build direction

ext_descriptions.ext_description: an attribute inherited from the that shall be redeclared as for the Build_direction_representation.
an attribute inherited from the that shall be redeclared as for the Build_direction_representation.

ext_description.p: A Additive_manufacturing_x_direction_representation is a type of that defines the part orientation relative to the front of the build surface.

figure.title: An illustration of the X direction

ext_descriptions.ext_description: an attribute inherited from the that shall be redeclared as for the Build_direction_representation.
an attribute inherited from the that shall be redeclared as for the Additive_manufacturing_x_direction_representation.
A Additive_manufacturing_placement_representation is a type of that defines the basis for the placement (location and orientation(s)) of the part with its supports geometry.
an attribute inherited from the that shall be redeclared as for the Additive_manufacturing_placement_representation
specifies the point of the geometry that will be located on the build plate.
specifies the built direction of the part for processes employing planar layer addition of material.
A Additive_manufacturing_workplan is a type of that defines the additive manufacturing operation.
an attribute inherited from the that specifies the type of process to 'Additive manufacturing’.

ext_description.p: A Additive_manufacturing_workplan_occurrence is a type of that specifies a usage of a in a . This association states that the is part of the .
ext_description.note: This mechanism enables the reuse of a in the context of more than one .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: an attribute inherited from the that shall be redeclared as .
A Additive_manufacturing_process_product_association is a type of that defines the output of the additive manufacturing operation.
an attribute inherited from the that defines the workplan.
an attribute inherited from the that defines the setup.
an attribute inherited from the that specifies the role to ‘output’.
A Additive_manufacturing_setup is a type of that defines the setup for one or more workpieces.
specifies the frame of reference for the location of each workpiece related to the setup. The origin of the setup is identical with the build plate origin.
specifies one or more workpieces setup.
A Additive_manufacturing_workpiece_setup is a type of that specifies the usage of a workpiece in the setup.
an attribute inherited from the that defined the workpiece.
an attribute inherited from the that defined the setup.
specifies the transformation allowing the placement of the workpiece in the setup. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
A Additive_manufacturing_workpiece_placement is a type of that defined the location of a workpiece in the setup.
an attribute inherited from the that shall be redeclared as .
A Additive_manufacturing_build_plate_assignment is a type of that allows the assignment of the build plate to an .
an attribute inherited from the that defines the .
an attribute inherited from the that defines the .

ext_description.p: A Build_plate_definition is a type of that defines a build plate.

figure.title: Illustration of a build plate with its build volume

ext_descriptions.ext_description: defines the representation of the build volume.
defines the geometric representation of the build plate. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
A Build_volume_representation is a type of that is an instance of a .
an attribute inherited from the that shall be redeclared as for the Build_volume_representation.
A Build_volume is a type of that specify the size of the build volume. A Build_volume is either a or a .
specifies the height of the Build_volume. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

ext_description.p: A Rectangular_build_volume is a type of that is rectangular. A Rectangular_build_volume is specified by its length and its width sizes.

figure.title: Illustration of a rectangular build volume for an additive Manufacturing Machine/System (Upward Building)

ext_descriptions.ext_description: defines the size of the build plate along the X direction.
defines the size of the build plate along the Y direction.
A Circular_build_volume is a type of that is circular. A Circular_build_volume is specified by its radius size.
defines the radius of the build plate.
